string-array.name: division_explanations
string-array.item:
You have 12 cookies, and you want to share them equally among 3 friends. 

How many cookies will each friend get? 

Divide 12 by 3. 

Each friend will get 4 cookies. 

We distribute the cookies equally. 

Each friend gets 4 cookies! 

Now, each friend has 4 cookies!

You have 20 candies, and you want to divide them equally into 5 bags. 

How many candies will be in each bag? 

Divide 20 by 5. 

Each bag will have 4 candies. 

We distribute the candies equally. 

Each bag gets 4 candies! 

Now, each bag has 4 candies!

You have 30 balloons, and you want to divide them equally among 6 children. 

How many balloons will each child get? 

Divide 30 by 6. 

Each child will get 5 balloons. 

We distribute the balloons equally. 

Each child gets 5 balloons! 

Now, each child has 5 balloons!

You have 16 pencils, and you want to share them equally among 4 students. 

How many pencils will each student get? 

Divide 16 by 4. 

Each student will get 4 pencils. 

We distribute the pencils equally. 

Each student gets 4 pencils! 

Now, each student has 4 pencils!

You have 24 marbles, and you want to divide them equally among 8 friends. 

How many marbles will each friend get? 

Divide 24 by 8. 

Each friend will get 3 marbles. 

We distribute the marbles equally. 

Each friend gets 3 marbles! 

Now, each friend has 3 marbles!
